vehicles.description: Across the road, there are several cars, either parked or in motion, facing this car.
vehicles.explanation: The vehicle must monitor these vehicles in order to predict any situation where they might enter its lane or open their doors.

general_perception.description and explanation: In the traffic image, there are several cars across the road, some of which are parked while others may be in motion, all facing the direction of the ego car. It is important for the vehicle to keep an eye on these cars to anticipate any potential situations where they might enter its lane or where the doors of the parked cars might open, which could affect the driving behavior of the autonomous vehicle. There are no vulnerable road users, traffic signs, traffic lights, traffic cones, barriers, or other objects present in the image that need to be considered.

driving_suggestion: Slow down and prepare to stop in case a dog enters your lane. Maintain a safe distance from vehicles, especially trucks and other dark-colored vehicles, to prevent not seeing pedestrians or car doors opening suddenly. It is recommended to monitor the opposite lane for any unusual behavior of parked or moving vehicles. Continuously observe if there is any change in speed or direction of the white van. In the absence of traffic lights or signs, standard road rules apply.

1.description and explanation: A dog is standing near the curb on the side of the road. Dogs are unpredictable and may enter the road, so the ego car should reduce speed and be prepared to stop if necessary to avoid a collision.
